executive_summary: Printing services have declined markedly over the past few years as demand for print media has fallen. Demand for printing services is highly correlated with the performance of the Printing industry (IBISWorld report 32311) and demand for book, newspaper and magazine publishing, both of which have experienced similar declines. This contraction occurred because of the fast-growing popularity of online media, causing many companies to reduce print advertising expenditures. These factors were exacerbated by the outbreak of COVID-19 in 2020. Overall, revenue for printing service providers is expected to drop at a CAGR of 4.1% during the current period, reaching $2.8 billion in 2024. This includes a 8.3% decline in revenue in that year.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Interest in Print Media Has Been Falling Consistently
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Print advertising expenditure has been on the decline, falling drastically over the past few years as companies shift their marketing budgets toward online platforms.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: The Growing Use of Publishing Software Has Challenged Demand
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Developments in computer software enable printers to specify text typeface, style and format, binding and pages.
Printing service providers are highly fragmented, with the top four companies in the industry accounting for less than two percent of the industry's total revenue.
Most companies employ nine people or fewer.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Providers Will Face Increased Challenges From Substitutes
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Commercial printers and graphic designers are expected to diversify services to include in-house prepress or postpress services.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: The Rising Dominance of Online Media Will Exacerbate the Industry's Decline
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: The continued consumer and advertiser transition to online media will cut into the circulation and advertising volumes of printed media.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Providers Will Have to Diversify Services to Compete
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Prepress software is expected to become more widely available during the outlook period, representing a challenge for service providers.

industry_definition: This industry includes companies that offer services that aid in the printing process.
key_trends: Printing service companies provide prepress and postpress services.
Demand for these services is determined by spending on printed books, magazines, newspapers and print advertising.

market_segmentation.segment_description: Since this industry primarily sells printing services.
Book and periodical (magazine) publishers combined comprise more than one-fifth of revenue.

products_and_services.product_description: Prepress services refer to the process of preparing digital files or hard-copy documents for printing.
Printing plates and cylinders is another prepress service.

tier_1_suppliers: Cardboard Box & Container Manufacturing in the US
Office Stationery Manufacturing in the US
Plastic Film, Sheet & Bag Manufacturing in the US
Structural Metal Product Manufacturing in the US
tier_2_suppliers: Plastic & Resin Manufacturing in the US
tier_1_buyers: Leather Good & Luggage Manufacturing in the US

demand_determinants.determinant_title: An Increasing Shift to Digital Mediums Has Eliminated Many Prepress Jobs
demand_determinants.determinant_description: As households and businesses have increasingly conducted business online, the need for document preparation for printing has declined.

demand_determinants.determinant_title: Digital Prepress Methods for Creating Printing Plates Have Surpassed the Traditional Method in Popularity
demand_determinants.determinant_description: Digital prepress enables printing service providers to transfer digital files directly to an electronically driven output device.

business_locations.location_description: The Great Lakes has the highest estimated share of establishments.

regulations_points.regulation_description: Most environmental regulations aimed at manufacturing industries affect the operations of printing service providers.

basis_points.basis_description: The Printing Services industry is highly fragmented, so major companies can't exert significant market power.

cost_factors.cost_factor_title: Rising input costs and falling demand
cost_factors.cost_factor_description: Rising input costs, specifically the price of paper, and consistently falling demand.

FAQs.question: Does your company specialize in one corner of the market or produce a diversified range of products?
FAQs.answer: Companies are defined by their specialization.
